Text: RE Pipeline Interconnect Forum InformationSounds great Ive heard back from Pat that she is planning to make it and Ive just sent a followup to Kathy Looking forward to seeing you Cheryl Original Message From mailto Sent Monday September PM To Snyder Cheryl Subject RE Pipeline Interconnect Forum Information Sheryl right now I am planning on coming in Friday night late since I could not get there Saturday morning So hope all works out If not I am sure I can find something to do on Saturday Thanks Lynn Original Message From Snyder Cheryl ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESSnyderCCherylCCxMpgeEcomEENRON ENRONcom Sent Wednesday September PM To Subject FW Pipeline Interconnect Forum Information Hi Ladies I think I have now mentioned to all of you that it would be great to get together on the Saturday prior to our meeting My current thought is to have the three of you travel together on the ferry from SF to Marin I would pick you up and we could visit the wine country for lunch Sound like a plan Ill provide more details later but here is some important information The ferry leaves from SF at am there are other times but we wouldnt make lunch So what do you think Doable Cheryl Snyder Business Systems Management California Gas Transmission Pacific Gas Electric Company Original Message From Hudson Todd Sent Wednesday September AM To Cc Snyder Cheryl Johnson Kirk Subject Pipeline Interconnect Forum Information Pipeline Interconnect Forum Participants PGEs California Gas Transmission has reserved a block of rooms at the Sheraton at Fishermans Wharf for the October Pipeline Interconnect Forum The group rate is good for the night of Sunday October To make a reservation call Identify yourself as a member of the Pipeline Interconnects Meeting for Sunday October Please make your reservation before October After this date the group rate may not be available Hotel Information Sheraton at Fishermans Wharf Mason St San Francisco CA Phone Group name Pipeline Interconnects Meeting Date Sunday October Check in time PM Check out time PM SingleDouble Occupancy Additional Person Reservation cut off date October The price of the room includes a continental breakfast and transportation service to PGE Meeting Information PGE Market Street Conference Rooms AB San Francisco CA Date Monday October Start time AM End time PM We are looking for participants who want to perform demonstrations of innovative services offered by their pipeline Dont be shy this is our opportunity to learn from each other We are also still soliciting suggestions for the agenda Here are a few ideas GISB Will the new standards affect your nomination schedules and processing times Hourly Scheduling Is anyone planning to implement this and would like to perform a demo Balancing solutions for problems caused by timing issues in the Intraday cycle Segmentation How is everybody addressing this GISB Capacity Release Standard possible scheduling issue Demonstrations of new services being offered by pipelines Cross Contract Ranking update Nominations Contracting Systems best practicesbenchmarking What is our purpose Comments regarding these recommended agenda items are welcome For those of you that confirmed for the Sunday welcome event we will be sending out more details in the future Todd Hudson PGE California Gas Transmission Attachments Map from SFO airport to hotel OLEObj Map from SFO to PGE OLEObj Map from Oakland airport to hotel OLEObj Map from Oakland airport to PGE OLEObj This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Pipeline Interconnect Forum Cc Pipeline Interconnect Forum Participants PGEs California Gas Transmission would like to invite you to a meeting to be held in San Francisco CA on Monday October We would also love for you to join us for a welcome lunch and activity on Sunday October This will be a lot of fun so plan on flying into San Francisco early if possible With the airline reliability being what it is its a good idea to arrive prior to Monday morning anyway Here are a few ideas for the agenda GISB Will the new standards affect your nomination schedules and processing times Hourly Scheduling Is anyone planning to implement this and would like to perform a demo Balancing solutions for problems caused by timing issues in the Intraday cycle Segmentation How is everybody addressing this GISB Capacity Release Standard possible scheduling issue Demonstrations of new services being offered by pipelines Cross Contract Ranking update Nominations Contracting Systems best practicesbenchmarking What is our purpose Comments regarding these recommended agenda items and other suggestions are welcome For planning purposes we need to know how many of you will be attending the meeting and the Sunday welcoming activity Please RSVP by July to Todd Hudson mailto for both the meeting and the Sunday activities Were really looking forward to seeing you all again and meeting our new participants Cheryl Snyder Business Systems Management California Gas Transmission Pacific Gas Electric Company

FW Pipeline Interconnect Forum InformationHi Ladies I think I have now mentioned to all of you that it would be great to get together on the Saturday prior to our meeting My current thought is to have the three of you travel together on the ferry from SF to Marin I would pick you up and we could visit the wine country for lunch Sound like a plan Ill provide more details later but here is some important information The ferry leaves from SF at am there are other times but we wouldnt make lunch So what do you think Doable Cheryl Snyder Business Systems Management California Gas Transmission
